name: ErysEdits
description: Just a few of my tweaks that were better off under one mod instead of standalone mods.

erysedits.name: ErysEdits
erysedits.desc: Settings for the ErysEdits mod itself.

gameplay.name: Gameplay
gameplay.desc:
Settings for tweaking gameplay as you please.

<cy>Note that some of these settings can get you banned from the leaderboards; enable them at your own risk.</c>

unverifiedPercent.name: Hide Percentage If Unverified
unverifiedPercent.description:
Hides the current percentage text and the progress bar if the level is not verified.

Useful for WIP levels whose percentages are based on time spent and not based on X position.

<cy>Due to how this feature is implemented, you should not close the game while playing a level with this feature active.</c>

forceAudioScale.name: Force Audio Scale
forceAudioScale.description:
Forces objects to pulse with the music.

<cy>For platformer levels ONLY: If you have RayDeeUx's BreakingPlatforming mod loaded/enabled, this setting will be ignored in favor of whatever Audio Scale preference you've set in there.</c>

forceVisibleEffect.name: Force Visible Effect
forceVisibleEffect.description:
Forces objects to activate usage effects (those translucent scaling circles when you interact with them).

<cy>Unfortunately, this applies to all objects even if they are marked invisible, and enabling this will count as cheating.</c>

saveEditorLevel.name: Save Editor Level
saveEditorLevel.description: Enables a keybind (set to Ctrl + S by default) to save your level in the editor immediately <cy>without a confirmation</c>.

saveAndExit.name: Save And Exit
saveAndExit.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + Ctrl + S by default) to save your level in the editor and exit the editor <cy>without a confirmation</c>.

resumeShortcut.name: Resume Editor
resumeShortcut.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + 1 by default) to resume editing a level.

browser.name: Browser-like Navigation Keybinds
browser.desc: Keybinds for navigating most menus related to browsing/viewing online levels.

pageNavAnywhere.name: Arrow Keys in Pages
pageNavAnywhere.description:
Enables a keybind (set to Alt + Left/Right for previous/next pages, Shift Left/Right for first/last pages) to navigate between pages.

Because RobTop's infinite wisdom allowed him to implement this feature with the main levels (and level browsing menus) <cr>and literally nowhere else</c> in Geometry Dash.

<cj>No, I'm not mad about this. What makes you think that?</c>

refreshAnywhere.name: Refresh Anywhere
refreshAnywhere.description:
Enables a keybind (set to Ctrl + R by default) to refresh the layer you're on.
<cy>Use this keybind with caution; abusing/spamming this keybind can get you rate-limited or banned from RobTop's servers. By using this keybind for any reason, you agree to hold harmless the mod developer (RayDeeUx) or any lead developer of Geode and assume all responsibility for any consequences.</c>

viewCommentsAnywhere.name: View Comments
viewCommentsAnywhere.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + C by default) to view comments (either for a specific profile or for a level).

likeDislikeShortcut.name: Like/Dislike
likeDislikeShortcut.description: Enables a keybind (set to Left for liking and Right for disliking) to like/dislike content.

level-search-layer.name: Level Search Menu Navigation
level-search-layer.desc: Keybinds for the level search menu.

clearFilters.name: Clear Search Filters
clearFilters.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + Delete by default) to prepare to clear your search filters.

openFilters.name: Open Search Filters
openFilters.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + Minus by default) to open advanced search filters.

searchMode.name: Toggle Levels/Lists Mode
searchMode.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + Backspace by default) to switch between searching for levels and level lists.

starToggle.name: Star/Moon Rate Filter
starToggle.description: Enables a keybind (set to Alt + 0 by default) to toggle the star rate filter.

quickSearch.name: Quick Search Shortcuts
quickSearch.description: Enables several keybinds (set to Ctrl + D(ownloads), Ctrl + T(rending), Ctrl + A(warded), Ctrl + L(ikes), Ctrl + R(ecent), Ctrl + F(ollowed), Ctrl + S(ent), Ctrl + M(agic), and Ctrl + (Fr)I(ends)) to open a quick search option.

lengthFilter.name: Level Length Filters
lengthFilter.description: Enables several keybinds (set to Alt + <cy>[1 through 6]</c> by default) to toggle a level length search filter.

difficultyFilter.name: Level Difficulty Filters
difficultyFilter.description: Enables several keybinds (set to Ctrl + <cy>[1 through 9]</c> by default) to toggle a level difficulty search filter.

demonFilter.name: Demon Filters
demonFilter.description: Enables several keybinds (set to Shift + Ctrl + <cy>[1 through 6]</c> by default) to toggle a demon search filter.

my-levels.name: "My Levels" Navigation
my-levels.desc: Keybinds for navigating your own editor levels/level lists.

newEditorLevel.name: Create New Level/List
newEditorLevel.description: Enables a keybind (set to Ctrl + N by default) to create a new level/list.

toggleLevelLists.name: Toggle Levels/Lists Mode
toggleLevelLists.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + Ctrl + L by default) to toggle between viewing local editor levels and local level lists.

viewUploaded.name: View Uploaded Levels/Lists
viewUploaded.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + Ctrl + Alt + L by default) to view uploaded levels/level lists.

misc-keybinds.name: Misc. Keybinds
misc-keybinds.desc: Keybind-related toggles for navigating all sorts of menus.

moreOptions.name: More Options Navigation
moreOptions.description: Enables a keybind (set to Ctrl + O by default) to open your Geometry Dash settings.

garageNavigation.name: Icon Kit Navigation
garageNavigation.description: Enables several keybinds (set to the whole numrow for each gamemode [Shift + 2 for jetpacks], left/right arrow keys, Alt + S(hards) and Alt + C(olor) by default) to navigate the garage/icon kit.

infoLayerNavigation.name: Comment Viewing Shortcuts
infoLayerNavigation.description: Enables several keybinds (set to 1, 2, 3, 4 by default) to toggle various options for viewing comments, much like toggling between the "Build", "Edit", and "Delete" modes in the level editor.

navigateGauntlets.name: Gauntlets Navigation
navigateGauntlets.description: Enables several keybinds (Left/Right for previous/next pages, 1/2/3 for the first, second, and third gauntlets visible on screen) to navigate the Gauntlets.

shiftForVault.name: Shift Click to Vaults/Chambers/Treasure
shiftForVault.description:
Requires holding the Shift key to enter (vanilla GD) menus that change the menu loop music.

Note that this will not apply to The Tower.

erysEditsSettings.name: ErysEdits Settings
erysEditsSettings.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + Alt + Ctrl + E by default) to open the settings menu for ErysEdits.

geodeModsList.name: Geode Mods List
geodeModsList.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + Alt + Ctrl + G by default) to open the Geode mods list.

customKeybinds.name: Open Custom Keybinds
customKeybinds.description: Enables a keybind (set to Shift + Alt + Ctrl + K by default) to open your custom keybinds.

alert-layers.name: Alert Layers
alert-layers.desc: Settings for messing with the appearances of FLAlertLayers.

flAlertWidthMultiplier.name: Width Multiplier
flAlertWidthMultiplier.description:
Multiplies the width of <cy>most</c> Alert Layers
(such as this one you're viewing).

Don't worry, the mod will cap all widths to <cg>420</c> units.

<cy>(Enabling the "Text Scroll" setting a bit further below this one will override whatever value you've set here.)</c>

textScale.name: Text Scale
textScale.description:
Changes the text scale of <cy>most</c> Alert Layers
(such as this one you're viewing).

<cy>(Enabling the "Text Scroll" setting a bit below this one will override whatever value you've set here. Text scales are also ignored in alerts with scrolling already enabled beforehand.)</c>

textScroll.name: Text Scroll
textScroll.description:
Enable (with 1), ignore (with 0), or disable (with -1) text scrolling in <cy>most</c> Alert Layers
(such as this one you're viewing).

<cy>Note that enabling text scroll will override your "Width Multiplier" and "Text Scale" settings above this one.</c>

slightlyCleanerGarage.name: Cleanup
slightlyCleanerGarage.description: Hides the ground line and random gray lock from the icon kit.

garageShardsMenu.name: Shards Menu Scale
garageShardsMenu.description: Set the scaling of the shards menu of the icon kit. Useful as more mods begin hooking the icon kit menu to add their own buttons.

misc.name: Miscellaneous
misc.desc: Settings that couldn't fit into any other category.

levelDescFromList.name: Level Lists: View Level Desc
levelDescFromList.description: View an online level's description from the level list menu (and potentially without downloading the level first).

showModsListMode.name: Level End Screen: Show/Copy Mods List
showModsListMode.description:
<cp>RESTARTS REQUIRED TO APPLY CHANGES.</c>
<cl>Original ideas: ItzKiba, Alphalaneous. Adapted code: sofabeddd.</c>
The "Level Complete"/"Practice Complete" text becomes a button that lists your installed mods (and copies it to your clipboard).

0: Disables this feature.

<cc>macOS</c> <cy>users:</c>
<cy>To minimizes crashes, all values will categorize your installed mods by developer name. Values greater than 2 will separate each developer using new lines instead of commas.</c>

<cl>win</c>/<cg>Android</c> users:
1: Developer name, mod name, version number
2: Developer name + mod name only
3: Mod name + version number only
4: Mod name only

<cy>Disclaimer: This feature is a proof of concept, not a concrete product. Not all installed mods will be visible. By setting this value to anything besides the default (0), you assume full responsibility for all consequences.</c>

fixBITranslateOverlap.name: Comments: Fix Overlap in Compact View
fixBITranslateOverlap.description: Fix the overlap in buttons when viewing your own comments while Cvolton's BetterInfo and TastyForReal's Google Translate mod installed.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
